scripts.publish:all: turbo run build lint test --filter=!@examples/* && changeset version && changeset publish
scripts.publish:flutter-builder: turbo run build lint test --filter=@flutter-builder/* && changeset version && changeset publish
scripts.publish:flutter-daemon: turbo run build lint test --filter=@flutter-daemon/* && changeset version && changeset publish
scripts.publish:flutter-preview: turbo run build lint test --filter=!@examples/* --filter=!@flutter-builder/* && changeset version && changeset publish
